font_not_detected:
Note: No custom font files detected. It is recommended to find the following ttf font files in game resource files and place them in the parent directory:
      - zh-cn.ttf (Simplified Chinese)
      - zh-tw.ttf (Traditional Chinese)
      - ja-jp.ttf (Japanese, installing will enable Japanese text recognition)
      Loading the corresponding font file can effectively improve OCR accuracy, especially to avoid dashes (——) being misrecognized as (一一).

install_lib_prompt:
Installation tips:
1. First, you must update pip to the latest version:
   python -m pip install --upgrade pip
2. If installation fails, it may be a network issue, it is recommended to use domestic mirror sources:
{}
3. Windows users who encounter permission issues, please run the command prompt as administrator
4. macOS/Linux users who encounter permission issues, try using sudo:
{}
5. Ensure that the Python environment used is consistent with the environment when installing libraries
